channel.title: Tech's cool - up to a point!
channel.description: Tech's cool - up to a point!

item.title: Smart Home
item.description:
Smart Home

I did have 2 Apple TVs (1st and 2nd Gen) but they're really not necessary anymore with all the streaming available on all the other platforms now.  I have a chromecast for the bedroom, but that's just to use an idle 24" monitor.  Sometimes there are football matches on at 3-4am - with the chromecast I can watch them in bed.
